title: Rishabh Mondal
text:
Hi! I am Rishabh Mondal.As an enthusiastic learner, I am always eager to take up challenging tasks and push my limits to achieve excellence. My academic journey has give me a strong foundation in the concepts of computer science, and I have gained practical experience through various projects


M.Tech in Information Technology
Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology, Shibpur | Sept 2021 - June 2023
B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
The Neotia University, Kolkata |Sept 2017 - June 2021




An LSTM-based Fall Detection System with ROC optimization technique: A step towards more accuracy
Brain Tumor Detection using Convolution Neural Network.
Indian currency detection through KNN and audio transfer for blind people.




Winner of IBM ICE DAY (poster competition)|2019
